alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:23PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Elko County through 400 PM PDT... At 322 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Contact to 7 miles south of Tuscarora. Movement was west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Jarbidge, Tuscarora, Gibbs Ranch, Contact, Chicken Creek Summit, North Fork and Wild Horse Reservoir. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
